albums.title: If It Bleeds It Can Be Killed
albums.artist: Conway The Machine x Big Ghost
albums.comment: 1000 Corpses Black variant. Black record numbered 412 / 480. Second collab between Conway & Big Ghost. Red Beams goes hard.
